Hello guys, glad to be part now of these forums.

I have a little question, I have looked everywhere but can't find really a reply: is there any way to make BDArmory work with KSP 0.90? For me it shows the missiles and parts but they're kinda "inactive". Can't assign them to action groups, can't right-click to bring buttons up. Nothing.

I ask this because I've seen some people claim it works for them...

Thanks!
Well, I know the bombs have a space between "part" and ".cfg" (part .cfg), and by deleting those the bombs usually work. Did you install all the necessary files?

I will offer you what I did and maybe you'll have the same luck I did. I went to www.kerbalstuff.com and downloaded the newest patch from there. Although it did not indicate it was .90 ready, I noticed that the mod had been revised and posted in late December. Whether it was upgraded for .90 or not, I am not sure, but it solved the problems I was having - which were identical to yours. Hope that helped.

The in-flight selection and firing of ordnance (missiles and bombs) is now controlled by the Weapon Manager part - make sure your vessel includes at least one Weapon Manager.

Guns and turrets can be automatically controlled by the Weapons Manager, or manually targeted with the mouse.
